questSteps.stepDescription: Talk to Laniakea at south-east of the ruins on Anachronia. (Chat 2•✓•1•3)
additionalStepInformation: She is also at the ruins around the lodestone but she tells you to go to the south-east and talk to her there.
You can use option 2 on the Slayer cape to get to her quickly or teleport to Xolo City X via the Orthen teleportation device, then run south-east.

questSteps.stepDescription: Run west, up to the top of the stairs.
Siphon the shadow anima pools until you reach 100%.
Completing each pool will damage you 200 points. Be aware of that in case you are on low health points.
